a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Mineral processing involves the extraction, purification, or production of materials from ores, brines, or other raw
sources, often as a byproduct or through specialized industrial processes.
Data source: USGS - Mineral Commodity Summaries (2024); USGS - Historical Statistics for Mineral and Material Commodities (2023)
Note: Values refer to silicon content of ferrosilicon and silicon metal.
